LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.shareBtnDescr: Upload log file and get a link that you can share with others
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.shareConfirmMessage:
Upload game logs now?

This will post your game logs to a public server and give you the link to share with others. This is useful if you need help fixing a problem or would like to report an issue to a mod author.

No private information will be shared.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.shortUrls_tip: Produces a shorter link when uploading. Not recommended on Steam- short links are automatically removed.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.platformInfo_tip: Includes information about your CPU, memory and video card in the log.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.unlimitedLogSize_tip: When disabled, log size is limited to 10K lines to prevent very long logs from causing issues.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.alternativePlatform_tip: Use an alternative online platform (paste.gg) as the upload destination. Useful if GitHub is not working.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.errorTryAlternativePlat: Upload failed. Looks like sharing via GitHub is currently unavailable. You can try again using an alternative sharing service (paste.gg) by clicking "Retry" below.
LanguageData.HugsLogPublisher.githubToken_tip: Publishes logs to your own GitHub account when set. Paste a token from GitHub > Settings > Developer Settings > Personal access tokens. Leave blank to publish to the public HugsLib account.\n\nLogs published to your account can only be viewed by others using a link.
